_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five things a mendicant developing m: Few requirements and duties, and is unburdensome and contented with life’s necessities
Eat little, not devoted to filling their stomach
Rarely drowsy, and are dedicated to wakefulness
Get to take part in talk about self-effacement that helps open the heart, when they want, without trouble or difficulty
Review the extent of their mind’s freedom
